title: Holliday's Gold
description: A woman with hair of gold, on the run for her life… The Beast who will stop at nothing to find her… The rookie cop who just wants to do the right thing… And the three bears who got in the way. Read the debut novel by Steeven R. Orr that tells the Goldilocks fairy tale like it’s never been told before.
author: Steeven R. Orr
